level.heading: Timing of review.
level.text: A court shall not review a challenge to a response action chosen by the Mayor or to review any order issued by the Mayor, pursuant to § 8-634.01, except in the following circumstances:
An action for reimbursement pursuant to § 8-634.02;
An action for contribution pursuant to § 8-634.09; and
